definitions: A joining or merging of different parts or qualities in which the component elements are individually distinct.
The process of combining different parts or qualities or the state of being combined.
A particular arrangement of different elements.
(in sport) a coordinated and effective sequence of moves.
Denoting an object or process that unites different uses, functions, or ingredients.
The joining of substances in a compound with new properties.
A sequence of numbers or letters used to open a combination lock.
A motorcycle with a sidecar attached.
A single undergarment covering the body and legs.
A selection of a given number of elements from a larger number without regard to their arrangement.
